Package com.flipfit.business

Interface authenticationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthenticationService
public interface authenticationInterface
The AuthenticationInterface defines the contract for all authentication and registration operations. Any class that implements this interface must provide the functionality to log in users and register new customers or gym owners.
Author:

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on their email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      A User object if authentication is successful, otherwise null.

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(String fullName, String email, String password, long userPhone, String city, int pinCode, int paymentType, String paymentInfo)
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The customer's full name.
      email - The customer's email address.
      password - The customer's password.
      userPhone - The customer's phone number.
      city - The customer's city.
      pinCode - The customer's pincode.
      paymentType - The customer's payment type.
      paymentInfo - The customer's payment information.

    • registerGymOwner

      void registerGymOwner(String fullName, String email, String password, long userPhone, String city, int pinCode, String aadhaar, String pan, String gst)
      Registers a new gym owner in the system.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The gym owner's full name.
      email - The gym owner's email address.
      password - The gym owner's password.
      userPhone - The gym owner's phone number.
      city - The gym owner's city.
      pinCode - The gym owner's pincode.
      aadhaar - The gym owner's Aadhaar number.
      pan - The gym owner's PAN number.
      gst - The gym owner's GST number.
